channel.title: Will somone show me how to use this?
channel.description:
[b]Hello... My name is Oliver... I am a big fan of rs2 and I would like to try this... I need a tutorial or someone to show me how to use MoparScape... To help me would be a big thanks =)... My problem is...
It keep saying " Error connecting to server " " Must be down. and.. " Click Cancel and then Start button then to make your own server "...
I need some help with this![/b]
[i]Peace, Oliver[/i]
